com.teaminternational.coe.utils

Class CustomHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teaminternational.coe.utils.CustomHttpClient

  • public class CustomHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple custom http client class used by ZAPIManager for submitting requests to the Zephyr for JIRA Cloud API
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com
    See Also:
    ZAPIManager

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomHttpClient() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient getHttpClient()
      Creates and made basic configuration of object of CloseableHttpClient class for making requests to Zephyr API.
      org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitGETrequest(java.lang.String hostURL)
      Send GET request to the specified URL, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
      org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitPOSTrequest(java.lang.String hostURL, java.lang.String body)
      Send POST request to the specified URL and JSON body, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
      org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitPOSTrequest(java.lang.String sessionCookie, java.lang.String authToken, java.lang.String hostURL, java.lang.String body)
      Send POST request to the specified URL and JSON body with authorization and keeping session cookie, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
      org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitPutRequest(java.lang.String hostURL, java.lang.String body)
      Send PUTT request to the specified URL and JSON body, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.

    • Method Detail

      • getHttpClient

        public org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient getHttpClient()
        Creates and made basic configuration of object of CloseableHttpClient class for making requests to Zephyr API.
        Returns:
        object of CloseableHttpClient class

      • submitPOSTrequest

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitPOSTrequest(java.lang.String hostURL,
                                                                              java.lang.String body)
        Send POST request to the specified URL and JSON body, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
        Parameters:
        hostURL - URL to which request will be send
        body - text of body of request, can be the list of post parameters
        Returns:
        object of CloseableHttpResponse class or null in case of error

      • submitPOSTrequest

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitPOSTrequest(java.lang.String sessionCookie,
                                                                              java.lang.String authToken,
                                                                              java.lang.String hostURL,
                                                                              java.lang.String body)
        Send POST request to the specified URL and JSON body with authorization and keeping session cookie, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
        Parameters:
        sessionCookie - session id which was stored in cookie
        authToken - access token for authorisation on service
        hostURL - URL to which request will be send
        body - text of body of request, can be the list of post parameters
        Returns:
        object of CloseableHttpResponse class or null in case of error

      • submitGETrequest

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitGETrequest(java.lang.String hostURL)
        Send GET request to the specified URL, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
        Parameters:
        hostURL - URL to which request will be send
        Returns:
        object of CloseableHttpResponse class or null in case of error

      • submitPutRequest

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse submitPutRequest(java.lang.String hostURL,
                                                                             java.lang.String body)
        Send PUTT request to the specified URL and JSON body, return response as CloseableHttpResponse object.
        Parameters:
        hostURL - URL to which request will be send
        body - text of body of request, can be the list of put parameters
        Returns:
        object of CloseableHttpResponse class or null in case of error
